title: Silent Hill 3: The Movie 720P HD - Video Game Edit by Fungo
description:
Silent Hill 3: The Movie by Fungo
~An edit of the Silent Hill 3 video game in theatrical form~ <a href="
http://www.silenthillmedia.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.silenthillmedia.net</a> for more info

-----Information-----
This is a professionally edited, feature length movie of the 2003 video-game Silent Hill 3 in full 720p High Definition.

Run time is approximately 121 minutes and 30 seconds. It is in 16:9 aspect ratio (widescreen) and is in 720p High Definition. It is in an AVI container and is the best quality I have rendered. When I recorded the footage, I had a slower PC, so there are times the frame-rate will drop in the movie. It has English, Greek, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish subtitles.

More on this movie: <a href="
http://www.silenthillmedia.net/sh3themovie.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.silenthillmedia.net/sh3themovie.htm</a>

-----STORY-----
Heather, an average girl shopping at the mall, gets pulled into a nightmare filled with monsters. She later discovers there are dark secrets between her and the mysterious town of Silent Hill, then ventures forth for answers.

-----CREDITS-----

I would also like to thank specifically Hiroyuki Owaku for the incredible storyline, Masahiro Ito  for the disturbing creatures and design, Akira Yamaoka for his production and for bringing the games to life with his memorable music, Jeremy Blaustein for his incredible localization in the puzzles and story, and the rest of the staff for making it all happen.

----- [SPECIAL THANKS] -----

Thanks Bronze for all the ideas, especially the one that led to a better ending.

Thanks to all the fans that love and support my SH2 movie. It's because of you that I made a SH3 movie.

Very special thanks to Broken Notes for allowing me full use of their entire library of music to add an extra kick to the film.
